name: Chasing Tails
description: “Chasing Tails” is the first computer game that we (M and J Sedai) designed together. Inspired by Queer Jam 2021, we wanted to try our hands at creating a computer game cooperatively. The result is this short little game that is not even one bit autobiographical. We hope this little platformer will just be the first of many collaborative works. —M and J Sedai
